Project Dependencies

Project Dependency Graph

Dependency Tree

  • name.pehl.piriti:piriti-parent:pom:0.5

    Piriti

    Description: Annotation based JSON and XML mapper for GWT

    URL: http://code.google.com/p/piriti/

    Project License: Apache 2

    • name.pehl:totoe:jar:0.1 (provided)

      Totoe

      Description: XML parser for GWT with xpath and namespaces support

      URL: http://code.google.com/p/totoe/

      Project License: Apache 2

    • com.google.gwt:gwt-user:jar:2.0.4 (provided)

      GWT User Library 2.0

      Description: The GWT User Library supports the client-side components for building AJAX apps in the Java language using the Google Web Toolkit.

      URL: http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/

      Project License: The Apache Software License, Version 2.0

    • com.google.gwt:gwt-dev:jar:2.0.4 (provided)

      GWT Development Library 2.0

      Description: The GWT Development Library supports the Java to javascript compiler and the hosted mode runtime.

      URL: http://code.google.com/webtoolkit/

      Project License: The Apache Software License, Version 2.0

    • junit:junit:jar:4.8.1 (test)

      JUnit

      Description: JUnit is a regression testing framework written by Erich Gamma and Kent Beck. It is used by the developer who implements unit tests in Java.

      URL: http://junit.org

      Project License: Common Public License Version 1.0

    • org.easymock:easymock:jar:3.0 (test)

      EasyMock

      Description: EasyMock provides an easy way to create Mock Objects for interfaces and classes generating them on the fly

      URL: http://www.easymock.org/easymock

      Project License: Apache 2

      • cglib:cglib-nodep:jar:2.2 (test)

        Code Generation Library

        Description: Code generation library with shaded ASM dependecies

        URL: http://cglib.sourceforge.net/

        Project License: ASF 2.0

      • org.objenesis:objenesis:jar:1.2 (test)

        Objenesis

        Description: A library for instantiating Java objects

        URL: http://objenesis.googlecode.com/svn/docs/index.html

        Project License: Apache 2
